data.question: Using which language can a user request information from a database?
data.explanation: Query language is a method through which the database entries can be accessed.

data.question: Student(ID, name, dept name, tot_cred)
data.explanation: The attributes name, dept and tot_cred can have same values unlike ID.

data.question: Which one of the following is a procedural language?
data.explanation: Domain and Tuple relational calculus are non-procedural language. Query language is a method through which database entries can be accessed.

data.question: The_____ operation allows the combining of two relations by merging pairs of tuples, one from each relation, into a single tuple.
data.explanation: Join finds the common tuple in the relations and combines it.

data.question: The result which operation contains all pairs of tuples from the two relations, regardless of whether their attribute values match.
data.explanation: Cartesian product is the multiplication of all the values in the attributes.

data.question: The _______operation performs a set union of two “similarly structured” tables
data.explanation: Union just combines all the values of relations of same attributes.

data.question: The most commonly used operation in relational algebra for projecting a set of tuple from a relation is
data.explanation: Select is used to view the tuples of the relation with or without some constraints.

data.question: The _______ operator takes the results of two queries and returns only rows that appear in both result sets.
data.explanation: The union operator gives the result which is the union of two queries and difference is the one where query which is not a part of second query.

data.question: A ________ is a pictorial depiction of the schema of a database that shows the relations in the database, their attributes, and primary keys and foreign keys.
The _________ provides a set of operations that take one or more relations as input and return a relation as an output.
